sense.def:
Kar je
safe
, ni škodljivo ali nevarno.

seg.quote: This powder is not safe for babies.
It isn't safe to swim here.
Keep your passport in a safe place.
Most food can safely be frozen for months.

sense.def:
To be safe
pomeni, da nismo v nikakršni nevarnosti.

Pri potovanju ali prihodu, ki je
safe
, se nikomur ne zgodi nič.

seg.quote: I sent a telegram to my mother saying I had arrived safely.

sense.def:
It is safe to say something
pomeni, da lahko nekaj rečemo brez tveganja, da bi se motili.

seg.quote: These practices, it is safe to say, are no longer common.
These creatures, we can safely say, have been dead a long time.

sense.def:
Kadar je skrivnost
safe with someone
, je tista oseba zanesljivo ne bo nikomur povedala.

seg.quote: They knew their secrets would be safe with him.

sense.def:
A safe
je močna kovinska škatla s posebnimi ključavnicami, v kateri hranimo denar, nakit in druge dragocenosti.

To be safe and sound
pomeni, da se nekomu, ki je bil v nevarnosti, ni zgodilo nič.

seg.quote: I'm glad to see you home safe and sound.

sense.def:
To play safe
pomeni, da ne tvegamo po nepotrebnem.

seg.quote: Play safe and always wear goggles.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo ali nekaj
in safe hands
, zanj ali za tisto stvar skrbijo zanesljivi ljudje, tako da se ne more nič zgoditi.

seg.quote: Don't worry, she's in safe hands at the hospital.
